title: 75. AITC: The Poetics of Transgression with Nisha Mathew and Soumitro Ghosh
itunes:title: 75. AITC: The Poetics of Transgression with Nisha Mathew and Soumitro Ghosh
description: How do we re-think what is essential? How does the spiritual influence design thinking? How can we understand the poetics of transgression in the design world? This week we continue our ongoing miniseries Architecture in the Time of Coronavirus with architects and Nisha Mathew and Soumitro Ghosh.
content:encoded: How do we re-think what is essential? How does the spiritual influence design thinking? How can we understand the poetics of transgression in the design world? This week we continue our ongoing miniseries Architecture in the Time of Coronavirus with architects and Nisha Mathew and Soumitro Ghosh.
